primer.translation[0].definitions[0].def: paint that you put on the surface of wood, metal etc before you put on the main layer of paint
primer.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a tube that contains explosive and is used to fire a gun or explode a bomb
primer.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a book that contains basic information about something
primer.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: a primer of good management techniques
primer.translation[0].definitions[3].def: a school book that contains very basic facts about a subject
